name: Wheeler Institute: Screening
description:
Wheeler Institute: Screening «You are a young adult integrating the Benjamin Wheeler Institute after his ability came out. In this center of reinsertion you will learn how to manipulate you ability and how to contain it, through training and psychologic rendez-vous. You’ll also meet the other residents, and maybe will you find someone special?»

Wheeler Institute: Screening is a Visual Novel (VN) with anthropomorphic characters  with extraordinary abilities in a 2000-like universe.

This is a project about differences and relationships.  

Last updates :

- August 2019: Release of the demonstration
- December 2019: Update of the demonstration (bug fix & feedbacks)
- May 2020: Trailer & ch0. Ameliorations
- August 2020: New chapter

Waiting your reactions on our Discord Server !

From France with Love !

Ruby & Ed, Ze Wheeler Team
